title: Seat Selection and Interaction Strategy Design in Virtual Reality Gamification Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education and ability to utilize digital tools
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution in VR-equipped environments, analyzing learner interaction patterns and applying findings to instructional design.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interaction preferences based on seating arrangement types in virtual reality environments.
Learners can design knowledge-sharing strategies among team members in gamification scenarios.
Learners can design educational processes utilizing location-based interaction effects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
